newsitem.title: USA: PICOM Insurance wins reorganization OK.
newsitem.headline: PICOM Insurance wins reorganization OK.

text.p: PICOM Insurance Co said on Friday the Michigan insurance commissioner granted final approval for the company's reorganization into a holding company system.
Effective at the close of business on August 30, PICOM will be a wholly-owned subsidiary of Professionals Insurance Co Management Group, a corporation formed to serve as the holding company.
The stock of Professionals Group will trade on the Nasdaq National Market under the symbol, which has been used by PICOM since 1993.
PICOM is a midwest professional liability insurer for physicians, hospitals and other health care professionals, lawyers and law firms.
